src:
Ďalší nečakaný párik v Hollywoode? Takéto spojenie sme nečakali
Uvidíme, čo je na týchto klebetách pravda.
07 Nov 2019, 12:10 by zv
Nedávno sa písalo o tom, že Kylie Jenner a Drake sa navzájom priťahujú. Teraz sa zdá, že sú o krok bližšie k tomu, aby tvorili pár. Podľa magazínu People trávia 22-ročná miliardárka a 33-ročný kanadský raper spolu viac a viac času.
Ich nemenovaný priateľ taktiež prilial olej do ohňa, keď sa vyjadril, že sa k sebe správajú "romanticky", odkedy si dali Kylie a Travis Scott minulý mesiac prestávku, aby si uvedomili, či sa ich cesty nadobro rozídu alebo krízu vo vzťahu prekonajú.



Foto: Profimedia.sk


Jennerka tvrdí, že sú len kamaráti a určite spolu nerandia. Tak až čas ukáže, či je na týchto špekuláciách niečo pravdivé alebo nie.
Drake v minulosti randil napríklad s Rihannou a Serenou Williams.
text:
Another unexpected couple in Hollywood? We did not expect such a connection
We'll see what's true on these gossip.
07 Nov 2019, 12:10 by Vol
Recently, it has been reported that Kylie Jenner and Drake attract each other. Now they seem to be one step closer to forming a pair. According to People magazine, 22-year-old billionaire and 33-year-old Canadian rapper spend more and more time together.
Their unnamed friend also poured oil on the fire, saying that they were "romantic" to each other since Kylie and Travis Scott had taken a break last month to realize whether their paths would break up or the crisis would overcome.



Foto: Profimedia.sk


Jenner says they're just friends and they don't date each other. So only time will tell whether something is true or not about these speculations.
In the past, Drake was dating Rihanna and Serena Williams.
